summary: Somewhat silly proof that Bodyslide works without CBBE.
descriptionHtml:
Installation:
----------------
Get Bodyslide 1.0.1 from optional files on CBBE page.
Unpack and put wherever you like.

Paste my Bodyslide folder over your existing
Bodyslide folder, i.e. merge them.


Then, you need the NIF files. Open UNP page and UNP Bouncing Boobs:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10470

You will need:
* femalebody_1.nif (from UNP Main package)
* B2femalebody_1.nif (from optional B2_TEST_RUN)
* bbp_femalebody_1.nif (renamed, from UNP Bouncing Boobs)

Put these in BodySlide\\ShapeData\\UNP.


More requirements
-------------------------

Having UNP installed already helps. Obviously, you need UNP textures.
If your slider setting is mostly in the Skinny area, go with Skinny
textures. And Main ones for Main. Don\'t forget hands and feet meshes.

If you want to use BBP version, you will need skeleton and animations
from CHSBHC (install the meshes folder if you don\'t know which files
you need). BBP Scale and Breathing Idles might be a good idea too:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7814
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7093


Running
-----------

There are 3 sets to choose from:

UNP BBP		- bbp Main 1.nif -> Skinny 1 - > Main 0 -> Skinny 0
UNP		        - Main 1.nif -> Skinny 1 - > Main 0 -> Skinny 0	
UNP B2		- B2 1.nif -> Skinny 1 - > Main 0 -> Skinny 0

When done, click \"Create Bodies\" for automatic install.
Or Ctrl+click to output files in Bodyslide folder.
author: moonballz
